name: PONG 64-Bit
description:
Play the timeless game of PONG! Whether you are new or have spent hours playing in the past, enjoy the simplicity of one of the best games of all time.

PONG is simple. Hit the ball to the other side of the screen, trying to get it past the CPU's paddle. If you get it past, you get a point! If the CPU hits it past your paddle, the CPU gets a point. Simple and challenging.

Unique 64-bit design like the original game to give you a throwback to the arcade days!

The game includes selection on score to win: 3, 5, 7, 10, or 15. Great playing field, just like the original!

Your paddle is on the right-hand side of your screen. You can slide your finger on your screen to move your paddle. So, you are in control. Move the paddle as fast as you want!

The ball moves faster the longer in between scores. This is to keep the game challenging and fun!

How many times can you win?

FREE!
